verses.roman:
āpane kāśī-miśra āilā prasāda lañā
prabhure bhikṣā karāilā āgraha kariyā

synonyms: āpane—personally; kāśī-miśra—Kāśī Miśra; āilā—came; prasāda lañā—taking prasāda; prabhure—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhikṣā karāilā—delivered prasāda to eat; āgraha kariyā—with great attention.
translation: Therefore Kāśī Miśra personally went there and delivered prasāda to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu with great attention and made Him eat.
